short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extension that can be used to get product information

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily achieve dropshipping from all Chinese local markets(1688, Taobao, Tmall, Xianyu, JD, Weidian, etc.) . Make your sourcing more cost-effective than AliExpress.

* One-Click Product Sourcing: Easily import products, making operations simpler.
* Smart Translation and Image Optimization: Automatically translate product information and optimize images with AI.
* Automated Fulfillment: Automatically purchase, process, and ship according to preset rules, enhancing efficiency and convenience.
* Standardized Quality Control: Each procured product is guaranteed with strict quality assurance, eliminating after-sales disputes.
* Diverse Service Processing: Provide flexible order, product, and package processing services tailored to different business scenarios, sales categories, and service requirements.
* Extensive International Logistics Network: Support shipping to over 200 countries worldwide, offering high-quality logistics routes with various postal limits, time standards, and price tiers.
* 24/7 Professional Customer Support: One-on-one VIP customer service, always ready to resolve your issues and meet your needs.
